short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically add your card number when shopping onine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a companion extension to the Klutch App. You can use it to view your card numbers directly on the browser and even create new virtual cards.
